where boardTitle LIKE '%'||#data#||'%' and boardKindNum = 4 order by BoardNum DESC

select BOARDNUM, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, TO_CHAR(BOARDDATE2,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOARDDATE2, BOARDCOUNT, BOARDKINDNUM, MEMNUM, ROW_NUMBER() over(order by boardNum)as boardGroupNum FROM board where boardKindNum = 4 order by boardGroupNum DESC
sqlMap.insert:
select seq_board.nextval as boardNum from dual
insert into board (boardNum, boardTitle, boardContent, boardDate2, boardCount, boardKindNum, memNum) values (#boardNum#, #boardTitle#, #boardContent#, SysDate, 0,4, 1)
sqlMap.update:
update board
set boardTitle=#boardTitle#, boardContent=#boardContent#
where boardNum=#boardNum#
sqlMap.insert: insert into files (fileNum, fileName, boardNum) values(seq_files.nextval, #fileName#, #boardNum#)
